title: Simon Hart – 2021 Statement Following Death of HRH The Duke of Edinburgh
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Simon Hart, the Secretary of State for Wales, on 10 April 2021.
content:
Prince Philip was a phenomenal public servant who led an inspirational life of dedicated support to the nation’s longest-reigning monarch.
